I love this game, I enjoy playing killer and doing a long chase then finally hooking that one person who stuns you then blinds you but you out smarting them then hooking them, but then the game ends with one person dead. 8/10 would eat pallet agian.

Игра супер, дает кучу эмоций как плохих, так и хороших. Надеюсь что разработчики постараются улучшить игру убрав множество багов и улучшив качество картиник. Ведь если это произойдет игре не будет равных. Но жаль, она таковой не стала. Манов унизили и бегают с нев патчами за сурвами и сделать мало чего могут.

Не так давно закрыли покупки в РФ, я просто полон горя и негодования. Потратил на игру 1600 ч и вот итог....
Good game overall, tough it needs more balancement by the devs, survivors have too many tools.
Даже через несколько лет игра остаётся весёлой для игры с друзьями

I've played this game since the beta and It has of course had its ups and downs, some of the mechanics and changes in the game have made me question my want to continue playing it after 1,500+ hours that I had spent in it but overall, the devs have come a long way from what they started with. I would happily continue playing this game and recommend it to anyone who is looking for something that can be somewhat scary at times or if you just enjoy murdering people!

after a few months of update i'm getting a much better ping but too bad most people always choose being a killer rather than a survivor. making it hard to queue up as a killer. but over all it's a fun experience

Jest to naprawdę świetna gra dla osób, które lubią kooperacje lub znęcanie się nad innymi. Community bywa lekko upośledzone, ale zauważam, że jest tego coraz mniej. Musze przyznać, że jest to jedna z gier, przy której bawiłem się najlepiej. Jednak jeżeli ktoś szuka horroru nie polecam nie da się przy tej grze przestraszyć.

Ich muss sagen, 

Dead by Daylight ( DbD ) ist mein absolutes lieblings Spiele!

Die Grafik passt einfach zum Gameplay und wenn man sich erstmal an das skillcheck Geräusch gewöhnt hat, wird man merken, dass man mit den Generatoren nicht mehr soviel verpatzt.

Das Spiel ist, kurz und knackig, gesagt ein Spiel was man echt gut mit Freunden (4 Survivors)
oder bei " Töte deine Freunde " einfach Laune macht! 

Ich finde dieses Spiel einfach herrlich und ich würde mich nur über eine Sache freuen...

Das Killer nicht mehr die Lobbymaker sind xD.


Viel Spaß und Game on! :)
Игра хорошая, но попадаются дауны сурвы и кемперы маны, от которых не избавиться

This game turns me on, like big time.
Once my testosterone levels spike I gain toxic masculinity, at which point if I'm being chased then God help that killer.
Every missed hit at a window, every pallet stun I'm literally screaming as I feed my sadistic urges.
I'm glad the lobby times aren't instant, it gives me a chance to clean up.
God damn this makes me so angry but its so good
Ein gutes Spiel um die Zeit zu vetreiben :)

I played Dead by Daylight for several hours, just to kill time with friends. Even with that said, I can't recommend Dead by Daylight, because the gameplay for survivors is too simple. Walk to objective, hold mouse button 1 and press spacebar for quick-time events as a survivor. 

At base the survivors have access to different perks to set them apart, but you can unlock the perks for anyone with enough playtime, making the survivors just a cosmetic. 

The gameplay for the killers is different and changes up with each DLC, so if you are buying the game to play killer, then I could recommend it for that purpose. 

Overall, Dead by Daylight essentially popularized 1v4 style games, but at this point there are better options than Dead by Daylight, so I cannot recommend it for it's simplicity.
I think they did a pretty good job so far...
